text: Scolopendrellidae is a family of symphylans in the class Symphyla. There are about 7 genera and at least 30 described species in Scolopendrellidae. ==Genera== * Geophilella * Pseudoscutigerella * Scolopendrella * Scolopendrellina * Scolopendrellopsis * Symphylella * Symphylellopsis ==References== ==Further reading== * * * Category:Myriapod families
title: Scolopendrellidae
